attributes.action: We want you to make the minimum wage of £25.70
attributes.background: To reconsider the threshold amount of £38,700 or the economy will go bust ,there will be more poverty and maybe increasing the minimum wage to £25.70/hour

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure if you want the Government to increase the minimum wage, or cancel plans to change minimum income requirements for certain visas.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.

We have published the following petition, which you might like to sign:

Don’t increase the income requirement for family visas to £38,700: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/652602

Increase minimum wage to £20 an hour: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/647297
